import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text, Center } from "@chakra-ui/layout"; import { Input, Stack, InputGroup , InputRightElement } from "@chakra-ui/react" import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image"; import { Button } from "@chakra-ui/button"; import NavGoNFT from "../components/NavGoNFT"; import {useState} from 'react' import '../CSS/GoNFT.css'; import ArrowDown from "../images/Vector.png"; import GoFundImg from "../images/GoFundNft.png"; import Conquistafa from "../images/01.png"; import EngajaFideliza from "../images/02.png"; import NovasOportunidades from "../images/03.png"; import Monetiza from "../images/04.png"; import Captacao from "../images/05.png"; import Inovaçao from "../images/06.png"; import digitaçao from "../images/07.png"; import mobile from "../images/mobile2.png"; import check from "../images/check.png"; import card1 from "../images/card1.png"; import card2 from "../images/card2.png"; import card3 from "../images/card3.png"; import card4 from "../images/card4.png"; import calculadora from "../images/calculadora.png"; import fundoDetalhe from "../images/fundoDetalhe.png"; //import fundoDetalheBloco6e7 from "../images/fundoDetalheBloco6e7.png"; import vector from "../images/Vectordireita.png"; import { listItems, listItemsBeneficios } from "../utils/GoNFT"; export default function GoFNT() { const evento = document.querySelector("#evento"); evento?.addEventListener("mouseover",function(){ const legenda = document.querySelector("#legenda"); legenda?.classList.remove("hide"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseout",function(){ const legenda = document.querySelector("#legenda"); legenda?.classList.add("hide"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseover",function(){ const Primeiralegenda = document.querySelector("#Primeiralegenda"); Primeiralegenda?.classList.add("hidetxt"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseout",function(){ const Primeiralegenda = document.querySelector("#Primeiralegenda"); Primeiralegenda?.classList.remove("hidetxt"); }) const [qtdUsers, setqtdUsers] = useState(); const [valorUsers, setValorToken] = useState(); const [conversao, setPorcentagem] = useState(); const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (qtdUsers === "" || valorUsers === "" || conversao === "") { return false; } const usuariosComprados = ( parseInt(conversao) / 100 ) * parseInt(qtdUsers) const resultadoCompra = usuariosComprados * parseInt(valorUsers) document.getElementById("resultado").innerHTML = resultadoCompra; }; return ( APRESENTANDO...
